title: Mesenchymal stem cells: building blocks for molecular medicine in the 21st century
publication_info: AI Caplan, SP Bruder - Trends in molecular medicine, 2001 - Elsevier

title: Mesenchymal stem cells: isolation and therapeutics

title: The concept of mesenchymal stem cells

snippet:

appear to constitute a heterogeneous population of undifferentiated and committed, lineage…
